癠字的基本解释

癠
jì
病：“亲癠，色容不盛，此孝子之疏节也。”
短小；瘦小。

癠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》徂奚切，平齊，從。］
［《廣韻》徂禮切，上薺，從。］
［《廣韻》在詣切，去霽，從。］
(1)疾病，生病。
(2)短小；瘦小。

癠字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癠； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页782第15
〔古文〕?【廣韻】在詣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】才詣切，?音嚌。【爾雅·釋詁】病也。【禮·玉藻】親癠色容不盛，此孝子之疏節也。【註】癠，病也。方氏曰：人氣體和則齊，不和則害於齊，故謂之癠。　又【博雅】癠，短也。　又【廣韻】徂禮切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】在禮切，?音薺。【揚子·方言】江湘閒凡物生而不長大曰癠。【註】今俗呼小爲癠。　又【集韻】子禮切，音濟。義同。　又前西切，音齊。病也。

癠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
癠字的起名意思

暂无。

癠
Basic explanation of words
癠
jì
Illness: "Professionalism, lack of color and capacity, this is also the sparseness of a dutiful son."
Short; thin.
癠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" ridiculously cut, even, from. ]
["Guangyun" ceremonial cut, upper water chestnut, from. ]
["Guangyun" is cutting, go to Ji, from. ]
(1) Disease, sickness.
(2) Short and small;
癠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Yi Characters] 　癠; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 782, 15
[Ancient text]? [Guangyun] It’s not until you cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]. 【Erya·Shigu】I'm sick. 【Rite·Yuzao】The lack of color and tolerance of the promophobia is the sparseness of this filial son. [Note] Diseases are also caused by disease. Fang said: People's gas will harm Qi if they are in harmony, so it is called qi.　[Bo Ya] again, short.　 [Guang Yun] Li Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] in Li Qi,? Yin Nian. [Yangtze Dialect] Jiang Xiang said that all things are born without growing up. [Note] Nowadays, the common people call small for 癠.　 [Ji Yun] Zi Liqie, sound Ji. The same meaning.　 Sicily again, the sound is uniform. Sick too.
